thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Portable Outdoor Shower (OCM-943)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Portable Outdoor Shower (OCM-943) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Portable Outdoor Shower (OCM-943)
text:
InventHelp, founded in 1984 in Pittsburgh, is submitting the QUICK RINSE to companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 24, 2015
"I want to be able to shower off after I go surfing, but, of course, there are no showers available at many of the beaches I frequent," said an inventor from Orange, Calif. "To ensure that I had a way to wash off, I came up with this portable outdoor shower."
He created a prototype for the QUICK RINSE to enable the user to shower outdoors in remote locations. The accessory ensures that there is a shower readily available. This eliminates the need to use on-site showers. Additionally, the unit features a compact, easily portable design that can be set up virtually anywhere.
The original design was submitted to the Orange County office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-OCM-943, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
